Interface Grounding

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GroundingImp

    public interface Grounding
    Planning task grounding.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void computeStaticFunctions(Task task, AgentCommunication comm)
      Computes the list of static functions, i.e. functions whose values do not change due to the action effects.
      GroundedTask ground(Task task, AgentCommunication comm, boolean negationByFailure)
      Grounds a planning task.

      • ground

        GroundedTask ground(Task task,
                  AgentCommunication comm,
                  boolean negationByFailure)
        Grounds a planning task.
        Parameters:
        task - Planning task
        comm - Communication utility
        negationByFailure - true if the used model is negation by failure; false if it is unknown by failure
        Returns:
        Grounded task
        Since:
        1.0
